title: Remedies cumulative
context: ยง576B-104 Remedies cumulative. (a) Remedies provided by this chapter are cumulative and do not affect the availability of remedies under other law or the recognition of a foreign support order on the basis of comity. (b) This chapter does not: (1) Provide the exclusive method of establishing or enforcing a support order under the law of this State; or (2) Grant a tribunal of this State jurisdiction to render judgment or issue an order relating to child custody or visitation in a proceeding under this chapter. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; ren and am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1] Note Section was former ยง576B-103.
